Description: Fullstack Web Developer, I help my customers in the realization and design of their digital projects.
Summary: In 2018, I started my freelance business alongside my studies. I had the opportunity to work on various projects, ranging from the creation of showcase sites to the implementation of e-commerce platforms. In 2022, I joined the [MyLittleTrip](#work) team as a technical manager to participate in the technological development of the platform. Today, I am looking for new challenges and stimulating projects.
workExperience.journey: My professional journey and career progression
MyLittleTrip Description: Complete management of the technical department of the MyLittleTrip platform. Development of new features, performance optimization and site maintenance.
Modo Lead Description: Management of the Web development team. Implementation of new development processes, performance optimization and maintenance of client sites. Completion of the most complex web projects.
Modo Description: Complete development of websites using WordPress and Laravel. Creation of custom themes and plugins. Performance optimization and site maintenance.
Gamecash Description: Development of new features on the e-commerce site. Performance optimization and site maintenance.
BTS Degree: HTC Digital Systems option Computer and Networks
A Level Degree: A Level "STI2D" option Information Systems and Digital
I'm an active open-source contributor an: I'm an active open-source contributor and have worked on a variety of projects. Here are a few of my favorites.
I am always open to new opportunities an: I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out to me via email at
Personal dashboard for home use. Display: Personal dashboard for home use. Displaying weather, calendar, tasks, and more. Made to be used on a big touch screen.
A simple IP management tool written in P: A simple IP management tool written in PHP. Not my project, but I am part of the maintainers.
seo.description: Fullstack Web Developer specializing in PHP, Laravel, and modern JavaScript frameworks. I help businesses build scalable web applications and digital solutions.
seo.keywords: web developer, fullstack developer, PHP developer, Laravel developer, Svelte developer, freelance developer, web development, France
testimonials.label: What clients say
testimonials.description: Here's what some of my clients and colleagues have to say about working with me.
testimonial.myriam: I had the opportunity to collaborate with Axel on improving our PHPIP database, and I can only recommend his expertise. He quickly understood the technical challenges and proposed concrete, effective solutions perfectly suited to our needs. Thanks to his intervention, our system is now much more optimized, smooth, and reliable. I particularly appreciated his responsiveness, his teaching skills, and his attention to detail throughout our collaboration. Working with Axel has been a real asset for our firm. I recommend him without hesitation to any company or firm looking for quality digital support.
testimonial.amelie: We have been working with Axel for over 2 years [I think?!], and we are very satisfied with this collaboration, whether it's for developing our website or our database. Always very responsive and clear in his explanations, he always finds a solution to our requests. It's a wonderful collaboration that we hope will continue!
testimonial.amandine:
We've been collaborating with Axel for almost two years and it's a real pleasure working with him. He can do everything and always has a precise answer for us regardless of our needs. He's like the Usain Bolt of our service providers: the fastest and most efficient. In short, the best in his field!
Very professional, serious, rigorous, reliable, and extremely friendly to boot, Axel has our complete trust and I can only recommend him!
testimonial.claire:
I've been working with Axel for 1 year. Initially, I contacted him to install online software for my professional activity. Although he wasn't familiar with my field, he understood my needs very well, reformulated them perfectly, and adapted the software to my tools and usage. I use it daily and am fully satisfied. In case of updates or bugs, Axel intervenes very quickly, which minimizes interruptions.
A true Swiss Army knife, he has a solution for each of my IT challenges. He developed an online searchable database for me, which gave him quite a challenge. By testing several approaches, he found a technical solution that allowed us to quickly have a usable interface. Again, he's very responsive when issues arise and is always available to make modifications.
Currently, we're working on redesigning my website. His cross-functional knowledge in this area allows him to guide me at each step and to bring in the right people when he feels he needs complementary skills.
What I particularly appreciate about Axel: the special care he takes in his work, the quality of his deliverables, listening to the client and the ability to reformulate needs, transparency and clear explanations about the progress of his services, responsiveness, reasonable rates, and continuous follow-up. These qualities make him a long-term partner, whom I don't hesitate to recommend whenever I have the opportunity!
